div.p: Composite diatom percentage diagram (selected taxa) based on samples from cores CG0, CG1 and a core collected from the organic clays and detritus muds (Units 3 and 4) near the point of borehole 9 ( Fig. 5). The break recorded between 1100 cm and 1200 cm is an artifact of the change in cores at this point. Salinity groupings follow Hustedt (1957).
